channel.title: Rust on Jakob Külzer
channel.description: Recent content in Rust on Jakob Külzer

item.title: Book Arrival: The Rust Programming Language
item.author: jakob.kuelzer@gmail.com (Jakob Külzer)
item.description: My copy of The Rust Programming Language arrived this week and I’m excited to dig deeper into Rust. Ever since I read that Rust works without a garbage collector and yet doesn’t require the programmer to manually allocate memory my interest has been piqued. I’ve dug a little into the first chapter, and I like it so far. The syntax of the language is not exotic, it has matching which I find very nice, and the build tool seems reasonable.
